text:
Trudeau 'Refugees' are Infecting Canadians with Coronavirus

11 refugees &12 staffers tested positive at a Refugee Centre in Toronto

Instead of the center being quarantine, refugees are free to come & go as they please and most aren't tested

FULL VIDEO: https://t.co/z9RKx8Outg https://t.co/ClNS2Xy3ut
